title: Phone freezes, music cuts out and freezes. Happened ever since update. Help please.
content: Checked for updates, factory reset, cleared memory, it's simply on Android's end since the update. Safe mode isn't a fix. So tired of hearing do safe mode. All I want is my phone fixed. I listen to music while I work and it's extremely frustrating to keep having it cut out. My phone is completely up to date, there is absolutely nothing wrong on my end. So how about some real information on how to fix this.  It also freezea when I play empire and puzzles the only real game that I play. So please don't send me try this try that.  I have already tried every trouble shooting tip.  I want an actual fix from your end. Seeing as you're the ones who messed this up.
